title: Pikmin Comes to the Nintendo Switch! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.05.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk Pikmin on Switch, when Call of Duty's getting announced, and the crazy Fall Guys numbers. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:16 - Housekeeping
Our Avengers impressions are live! Kinda Funny Gamescast on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast series.
As usual, big week. In addition to the normal programming…
We’re live reacting to PlayStation’s State of Play Thursday at 1 pm PT.
We’re streaming the Avengers Beta Friday at 2 pm PT.
Both on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and later on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:50 - PIKMIN LIVES
00:18:35 - Has Nintendo given up on 2020? - Best Friends Q:Chris from philly
00:19:03 - what the hell is nintendo doing? - Best Friends Q:Lexus
00:25:35 - Where’s the next Call of Duty? Matthew Handrahan GIB
00:32:45 - Fall Guys CRUSHES Launch
00:36:05 - How is this review bombing?  - Best Friends Q:Stephanie Smith
00:43:40 - Are online games doomed to have a bad day 1? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:47:00 - BlizzCon Gonna Be digital in 2021, Matthew Handrahan GIB
00:47:25 - Riot’s Taking a Week Off
00:50:10 - Out today
00:52:30 -  HIMS
 Reader mail   -
00:56:20 - When pre-orders open or when a company actively begins charging for pre-orders, shouldn't there be SOME clarity as to the level of exclusivity there will be, so people can actually be well informed consumers?!  - The Nano Biologist
01:06:15 - Squad Up: Lee Pollero[PS4 (Marvel's Avengers)] - LeethalArrow
01:07:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Greg
